attributes.action: Stop paying tax in the UK  anyone earning less then £25k a year
attributes.additional_details:
Living chrisis has gone up every day in the past 2 years, it's getting hard to live in the UK, you need to stop all taxes for everyone who earing less then £25k a year and 

Anyone who earns over £25k a year you should only take £1k a year of them not monthy yearly only
attributes.background: Stop paying tax in the UK anyone earning less the £25k a year

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626860
